title: France panorama. [No. 73/21]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Dream and adventure - original playgrounds for children. Measurements and physics - International Measurements and Physics Salon in Paris. 2. Road security - experiments carried out by the National Road Security Organisation. 3. The arts: The Lyon Ballet - Vittorio Biaggi and the Lyon Ballet. Heinz Mack - exhibition at the Museum of Modern Art.
